Title: System Administrator
Description: Education Dynamics, Inc.  Administration of the StudentTrac System

Title: Student
Description: The main role who we track data for.

Title: Guardian
Description: The parent or guardian of the main role

Title: Teacher
Description: The instructor who give instruction to the main role

Title: Support Staff
Description: Any staff Member who is not acting as a teacher

Title: Auditor
Description: Quality Assurance for the school and can modify records beyond the current month

Title: Curriculum
Description: Administrators of Curriculum Assets (Assessments, Courses and Guides)

Title: Client Administrator
Description: Top Level Administrator which has access to all things for a client
